name: Shieldon
flavorText: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.

attacks.name: Hard Face
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Shieldon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shield Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
